We have updated our terms and conditions. You will need to accept the new terms before you can continue and use the Field Nation app.

By accepting you agree to the new Terms of Service and acknowledge the additional %1$.1f%% fee per work order if you do not upload a certificate of insurance.

You have %2$d days until new Terms of Service are in effect.

By accepting you agree to the new Terms of Service and acknowledge the additional %1$.1f%% fee per work order if you do not upload a certificate of insurance.

You MUST accept to continue.

You do not have a certificate of insurance uploaded in your Field Nation profile. As a result, you will be charged an additional %1$.1f%% fee per work order effective March 1, 2015.

To upload a certificate of insurance and avoid the additional fee, log into the website from a computer and follow the instructions.

Service Fees
A 10% service fee will be deducted from your final total payment amount from this work order.

Terms
All the work orders that have been approved this week will be processed next week. You can view your payment status from the My Payments option from your account.
We\'re actively trying to improve the Field Nation App to better cater to your needs.
